channel.title: How do i setup and use.. please help
channel.description: how do i setup a donator command. and a staffzone, im using a 317.. i want to change the home teleport to varrock. its currently in draynor, then i want to set a command if you type ::donator it takes you to a specific place only donators can go to, and then i want ::staffzone to be a specific place. so can someone help. thanks

item.title: How do i setup and use.. please help
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

If you have a ton of errors, your going to need to fix them, what does your compiler say?
I’ll try and help you fix them o.O

Read full topic

item.title: How do i setup and use.. please help
item.dc:creator: @owner_millon owner millon
item.description:
@owner_millon wrote:

that gives me codes yes, but you see im new to all this server making i downloaded the server maker. im running on a 317 i used shop maker and all but my shops all have errors so i cant login, when i tried to edit my home teleport it didnt work im just realy confused

Read full topic
item.source: How do i setup and use.. please help

item.title: How do i setup and use.. please help
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Okay sure, give me a few minutes to write it out.

EDIT:
Here goes nothing!

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights > 1){ toX = (X COORDS); toY = (Y COORDS); sM("You have been teleported to the Staffzone"); } else { sM("You are not a Staff Member!"); } }

if (command.startsWith("donator") && character-donator > 1){ toX = (X COORDS); toY = (Y COORDS); sM("You have been teleported to the Donators Area!"); } else { sM("You are not a Donator!"); } }

PLEAE NOTE: You will need to change where it says X COORDS and Y COORDS To your coordinate numbers!
Also, if these commands don’t work it’s because your voids are different, simply change the command so your voids match and all will be well!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i setup and use.. please help

item.title: How do i setup and use.. please help
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

To change the home teleport to varrock, simply change the Teleport Coordinates.
And to make a command, simply find your other commands and make one up.
Same with staffzone, if you want me to do these for you, I will have a go, but they will be off the top of my head.

Read full topic
